jokes.joke: Me: 'dei unne paathe udane, ennaku 404 error varudh ra :)' Friend:'enne da, page not found eh ?' Me: 'Illada, ...words not found!'

jokes.name: Harish Anbalagan
jokes.joke: New Contributor: *creates 5th duplicate issue about same bug* Maintainer 1: 'Dei, check existing issues first da!' Maintainer 2: 'Every day same issue, different person!' Maintainer 3: 'Avana konjam solli niruthungada dei!'
